title: Mark Russell (actor)
text:
Mark Russell (born 12 November 1933) is a Scottish-American film and television actor. He is perhaps best known for playing "Detective Percy Saperstein" in the American <a href="crime%20drama">crime drama</a> television series "<a href="Kojak">Kojak</a>".
Born in <a href="Glasgow%2C%20Scotland">Glasgow, Scotland</a>, in which Russell was then raised in <a href="Brooklyn%2C%20New%20York">Brooklyn, New York</a>, later moving to <a href="California">California</a>. He began his career in 1959, where he first appeared in the <a href="Western%20%28genre%29">western</a> television series "<a href="Bonanza">Bonanza</a>". Russell guest-starred in numerous television programs, including, "<a href="The%20Fugitive%20%281963%20TV%20series%29">The Fugitive</a>", "<a href="12%20O%27Clock%20High%20%28TV%20series%29">12 O'Clock High</a>", "<a href="The%20Time%20Tunnel">The Time Tunnel</a>", "<a href="Batman%20%28TV%20series%29">Batman</a>", "<a href="Hogan%27s%20Heroes">Hogan's Heroes</a>", "<a href="Adam-12">Adam-12</a>", ', "<a href="Land%20of%20the%20Giants">Land of the Giants</a>", "<a href="Ironside%20%281967%20TV%20series%29">Ironside</a>", ', "<a href="Emergency%21">Emergency!</a>", "<a href="Quincy%2C%20M.E.">Quincy, M.E.</a>", "<a href="The%20Odd%20Couple%20%281970%20TV%20series%29">The Odd Couple</a>" and "<a href="Mannix">Mannix</a>".
Russell was originally a <a href="stand-in">stand-in</a> for actor, <a href="Telly%20Savalas">Telly Savalas</a>, who played the main role of "Lieutenant Theo Kojak". His character "Detective Percy Saperstein" was then created, in which he won the role. He also appeared on films such as, "<a href="The%20Errand%20Boy">The Errand Boy</a>", "<a href="Hangup">Hangup</a>", "<a href="Captain%20Newman%2C%20M.D.">Captain Newman, M.D.</a>", "<a href="Viva%20Las%20Vegas">Viva Las Vegas</a>", "<a href="Not%20with%20My%20Wife%2C%20You%20Don%27t">Not with My Wife, You Don't</a>", "<a href="The%20Comic">The Comic</a>", "<a href="Girl%20Happy">Girl Happy</a>", "<a href="How%20to%20Succeed%20in%20Business%20Without%20Really%20Trying%20%28film%29">How to Succeed in Business Without Really Trying</a>", "<a href="Youngblood%20Hawke%20%28film%29">Youngblood Hawke</a>", "<a href="The%20Notorious%20Landlady">The Notorious Landlady</a>", "<a href="Blume%20in%20Love">Blume in Love</a>", "<a href="How%20to%20Murder%20Your%20Wife">How to Murder Your Wife</a>", "<a href="Get%20to%20Know%20Your%20Rabbit">Get to Know Your Rabbit</a>", "<a href="Warning%20Shot%20%281967%20film%29">Warning Shot</a>" and "<a href="Moving%20Violation%20%28film%29">Moving Violation</a>".
